page.title: 01Bolton S.W. A Brief Review
page.content: This is an area of diverse character- ranging from farms and pastureland interspersed with pockets of suburban housing in the S.and W.at{Over Hulton and part of{Deane}- to a busy, densely populated area of shops, industry and terraced houses, relics of the Industrial Revolution, in the N.E. at{Daubhill}and{Great Lever}(this area is subject to urban renewal as old and unfit houses and industrial premises are demolished and sites are cleared to provide new housing areas). The S.E. corner of the map belongs to the N.W.(Highfield) area of{Farnworth. Until the l950's this was farmland. Since then, the 6 farms which occupied the land have been replaced by extensive housing development. The area between Great Lever and Farnworth is occupied by hospital buildings, farmland, and part of the golf course.
